name: Indie Jones vs Godzillu
description:
Use arrow keys to help Indie to recover the golden idol. Left and right for moving our hero, up (+ left or right) for jumping, down to go down the ladder. And watch out for falling rocks and baby monsters. If your live decrease to 0, you're dead. But we are nice, you would live again and could continue your escalation.

made with LÖVE 11.3 by

Graphic design : Godzillu

Programming : Globul

Sound design & music : Kayupla
